mapper.insert: insert into users(user_no, login_type, user_id, user_pw, user_name, phone, email, disease_no, birth, height, weight) values(seq_users_user_no.nextval, #{loginType}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{diseaseNo}, #{birth}, #{height}, #{weight})
mapper.select: select * from users where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
mapper.update: update users set user_name=#{userName}, user_pw=#{userPw}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, disease_no=#{diseaseNo}, birth=#{birth}, height=#{height}, weight=#{weight}, u_last_update=SYSDATE where user_id=#{userId}
